short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to guide students through Scratch lesson plans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Includes a variety of lesson plans for the block based coding website Scratch. Lesson plans range from all skill levels, with projects such as a platformer, soccer, and a dodging game! This extension allows you to learn how to make various games in Scratch.
